#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pb push_back
#define ft first
#define se second
#define mp make_pair


int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    string ans;
    while(t--){
    	int n, k;
    	scanf("%d%d", &n, &k);
    	stringstream tmp1, tmp;
    	tmp1<<k;
    	string ans=tmp1.str();
    	int x=ans.length();
    	ans.pb('$');
		for(int i = 1; i <=n; ++i){
		    tmp<<i;
		}//for i
		ans+=tmp.str();
		n=ans.length();
		int *z;
		z=new int[n];
		z[0]=n;
		for(int i = 1; i < n; ++i){
			z[i]=0;
		}//for i
		for (int i = 1, l=0, r=0; i <n; ++i){
		    if(i<=r) z[i]=min(r-i+1,z[i-l]);
		    while(i+z[i]<n && ans[z[i]]==ans[z[i]+i]){
		        z[i]++;
		    }
		    if(r<z[i]+i-1) {
		        l=i;
		        r=z[i]+i-1;
		    }
		}
		int cnt=0;
		for(int i = 1; i < n; ++i){
			if(z[i]==x) cnt++;
		}//for i
		printf("%d\n", cnt);
    }
	return 0;
}
